TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed ToolTipService extends System.Object
public ref class ToolTipService abstract sealed

summary.span: 表示提供屬性和事件的服務，以控制工具提示的顯示和行為。

span.span: Represents a service that provides properties and events to control the display and behavior of tooltips.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定定義項目的工具提示或屬性。You define a tooltip for an element by setting the or property. ToolTip 屬性會採用一個子系。The ToolTip property takes one child. 子系的內容有可能從簡單的文字字串至更複雜的內容這類包含內嵌文字和項目。The content of the child can vary from a simple text string to more complex content such as a that has embedded text and elements. 您可以定義為工具提示內容物件，但這並非必要。You can define tooltip content as a object, but this is not required. 當您沒有定義內容做為工具提示物件，您可以使用來定位及自訂工具提示內容的屬性。When you do not define the tooltip content as a object, you can use the properties to position and customize the tooltip content. 附加屬性的類別用來決定放置、 行為和外觀的工具提示。Attached properties of the class are used to determine the placement, behavior, and appearance of a tooltip. 定義工具提示的項目上設定這些屬性。These properties are set on the element that defines the tooltip. 類別和類別共用許多相同的屬性，可用來自訂工具提示。The class and the class share many of the same properties that are used to customize a tooltip. 如果對等並同時設定了屬性，屬性會優先。If equivalent and properties are both set, the property takes precedence. 比方說，如果這兩個屬性和屬性設定為物件、 值屬性使用。For example, if both the property and the property are set for a object, the value of the property is used. 下列計時屬性只會定義類別，並供所有的工具提示：The following timing properties are only defined for the class and are used by all tooltips: - - - 如需如何處理工具提示開啟或關閉時，會發生的事件資訊，請參閱和欄位。For information about how to handle the events that occur when the tooltip opens or closes, see the and fields. ， ， ，以及中的相同名稱的屬性具有類似的行為類別。, , , , and behave similarly to the properties of the same name in the class. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[快顯放置行為](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior.md)。For more information, see [Popup Placement Behavior](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior.md). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用類別來指定工具提示的行為。The following example shows how the use the class to specify the behavior of a tooltip. 您設定的屬性它們直接附加至公開的工具提示的項目類別。You set the properties of the class by attaching them directly to the element that exposes the tooltip. [!code-xaml[ToolTipService#NoToolTip](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ToolTipService/CSharp/Pane1.xaml#notooltip)]

summary.span: 取得或設定顯示兩個工具提示的最大間隔時間，其中第二個工具提示會在未經延遲的情況下立即顯示。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum time between the display of two tooltips where the second tooltip appears without a delay.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一般而言，當使用者將滑鼠指標移具有工具提示的物件，會延遲，才會顯示工具提示。Typically, when a user moves the mouse pointer over an object that has a tooltip, there is a delay before the tooltip is displayed. 此延遲是相等的值屬性。This delay is equal to the value of the property. 不過，在顯示工具提示之後還有一段期間的另一個工具提示可以顯示而不需等待的時間傳遞時間。However, after a tooltip is displayed there is a period of time during which another tooltip can be displayed without waiting for the time to pass. 使用指定這段期間屬性。You specify this time period by using the property. 當使用者將滑鼠移在這段時間內從一個項目具有值的工具提示，另一個項目顯示工具提示第二個工具提示的屬性不會套用，且會立即顯示第二個工具提示。When the user moves the mouse within this time period from one element that has a visible tooltip to another element that has a tooltip, the value of the property for the second tooltip is not applied and the second tooltip appears immediately. 如需有關如何取得或設定這個屬性的資訊，請參閱 < 和方法。For information about how to get or set this property, see the and methods. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|

span.span: The value of the property is less than zero (0).

summary.span: 取得或設定工具提示是否顯示延伸陰影效果。

span.span: Gets or sets whether the tooltip displays a drop shadow effect.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 工具提示控制項的預設樣式加入下拉式陰影效果。The default style for a tooltip control adds a drop shadow effect. 如果您沒有明確設定屬性的屬性值是`false`直到第一次會顯示工具提示。If you do not explicitly set the property, the property value is `false` until the first time the tooltip is displayed. 在顯示工具提示和樣式設定時套用的預設工具提示樣式屬性設`true`。The default tooltip style is applied when a tooltip is displayed and the style sets the property to `true`. 如果工具提示物件，同時兩者皆屬性和屬性指定的值屬性用。If the tooltip is a object and both the property and the property are specified, the value of the property is used. 如需有關如何取得或設定這個屬性在程式碼中的資訊，請參閱 < 和方法。For information about how to get or set this property in code, see the and methods. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## Examples 下列範例示範如何設定附加屬性類別。The following example shows how to set the attached property of the class. [!code-xml[ToolTipService#NoToolTip](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ToolTipService/CSharp/Pane1.xaml#notooltip)]

Public Shared ReadOnly HasDropShadowProperty As DependencyProperty

summary.span: 識別 附加屬性。

span.span: Identifies the attached property.

summary.span: 取得或設定位移，此位移為以 與 屬性為工具提示所指定的左邊區域。

span.span: Gets or sets the offset from the left of the area that is specified for the tooltip by the and properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性和屬性值會提供額外的調整，工具提示所定義的位置屬性和屬性值。The property and the property values provide additional adjustment to the position of a tooltip that is defined by the property and the property values. 行為類似於屬性。 behaves similarly to the property. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[快顯放置行為](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior.md)。For more information, see [Popup Placement Behavior](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior.md). ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ```

Public Shared ReadOnly HorizontalOffsetProperty As DependencyProperty

summary.span: 識別 附加屬性。

span.span: Identifies the attached property.

summary.span: 取得或設定工具提示開啟之前的時間長度。

span.span: Gets or sets the length of time before a tooltip opens.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一般而言，當使用者將滑鼠指標移具有工具提示的物件，會延遲，才會顯示工具提示。Typically, when a user moves the mouse pointer over an object that has a tooltip, there is a delay before the tooltip is displayed. 此延遲是相等的值屬性。This delay is equal to the value of the property. 不過，在顯示工具提示之後還有一段期間的另一個工具提示可以顯示而不需等待的時間傳遞時間。However, after a tooltip is displayed there is a period of time during which another tooltip can be displayed without waiting for the time to pass. 使用指定這段期間屬性。You specify this time period by using the property. 當使用者將滑鼠移在這段時間內從一個項目具有值的工具提示，另一個項目顯示工具提示第二個工具提示的屬性不會套用，且會立即顯示第二個工具提示。When the user moves the mouse within this time period from one element that has a visible tooltip to another element that has a tooltip, the value of the property for the second tooltip is not applied and the second tooltip appears immediately. 如需有關如何取得或設定這個屬性在程式碼中的資訊，請參閱 < 和方法。For information about how to get or set this property in code, see the and methods. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## Examples 下列範例示範如何設定計時屬性。The following example shows how to set the timing properties. [!code-xml[ToolTipService#NoToolTip](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ToolTipService/CSharp/Pane1.xaml#notooltip)]

span.span: The value of the property is less than zero (0).

Public Shared ReadOnly InitialShowDelayProperty As DependencyProperty

summary.span: 識別 附加屬性。

span.span: Identifies the attached property.

summary.span: 取得或設定是否顯示工具提示。

span.span: Gets or sets whether a tooltip appears.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要判斷工具提示目前是否為可見，請使用屬性。To determine whether a tooltip is currently visible, use the property. 如需有關如何取得或設定這個屬性在程式碼中的資訊，請參閱 < 和方法。For information about how to get or set this property in code, see the and methods. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何設定 屬性。The following example shows how to set the property. Public Shared ReadOnly IsOpenProperty As DependencyProperty

summary.span: 識別 附加屬性。

span.span: Identifies the attached property.

summary.span: 取得或設定工具提示開啟時的方向，並指定該工具提示與螢幕邊界重疊時的行為。

span.span: Gets or sets the orientation of the tooltip when it opens, and specifies how the tooltip behaves when it overlaps screen boundaries.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性是附加的屬性。This property is an attached property. 如需有關如何取得或設定這個屬性的值，在程式碼中的資訊，請參閱 < 和方法。For information about how to get or set the value of this property in code, see the and methods. 行為類似於屬性。 behaves similarly to the property. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[快顯放置行為](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior.md)。For more information, see [Popup Placement Behavior](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior.md). ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.DependencyProperty PlacementProperty
Public Shared ReadOnly PlacementProperty As DependencyProperty

summary.span: 識別 附加屬性。

span.span: Identifies the attached property.

summary.span: 取得或設定相對於工具提示所在位置的矩形區域。

span.span: Gets or sets the rectangular area relative to which the tooltip is positioned.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會指定相對於結構控制項放在開啟時。The property specifies a structure relative to which the control is positioned when it opens. 如果不是`null`，則結構定義相對於物件。If is not `null`, the structure is defined relative to the object. 否則，請指定結構定義相對於螢幕左上角。Otherwise, the specified structure is defined relative to the upper-left corner of the screen. 如果屬性設定為，工具提示會顯示相對於滑鼠的位置，而屬性沒有任何作用。If the property is set to , the tooltip is displayed relative to the location of the mouse, and the value of the property has no effect. 這個屬性是附加的屬性。This property is an attached property. 如需有關如何取得或設定這個屬性的值，在程式碼中的資訊，請參閱 < 和方法。For information about how to get or set the value of this property in code, see the and methods. 行為類似於屬性。 behaves similarly to the property. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[快顯放置行為](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior.md)。For more information, see [Popup Placement Behavior](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior.md). ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.DependencyProperty PlacementRectangleProperty
Public Shared ReadOnly PlacementRectangleProperty As DependencyProperty

summary.span: 識別 附加屬性。

span.span: Identifies the attached property.

summary.span: 取得或設定相對於工具提示所在位置的物件。

span.span: Gets or sets the object relative to which the tooltip is positioned.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不一定要據以定義工具提示的物件。The does not have to be the object on which the tooltip is defined. 例如，描述可以指定其為工具提示內出現當使用者將滑鼠指標暫停在。For example, a that describes an could specify its tooltip to appear over the when the user pauses the mouse pointer on the . 如果您未指定而且工具提示會有一個視覺化父代，視覺化父項目做為。If you do not specify a and the tooltip has a visual parent, the visual parent acts as the . 如果工具提示並沒有視覺化父項目和值屬性是`null`，工具提示控制項相對於螢幕左上角。If the tooltip does not have a visual parent and the value of the property is `null`, the tooltip control is positioned relative to the upper-left corner of the screen. 這個屬性是附加的屬性。This property is an attached property. 如需有關如何取得或設定這個屬性在程式碼中的資訊，請參閱 < 和方法。For information about how to get or set this property in code, see the and methods. 行為類似於屬性。 behaves similarly to the property. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[快顯放置行為](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior.md)。For more information, see [Popup Placement Behavior](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior.md). ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例示範如何設定的值`ToolTipService.VerticalOffset`附加屬性。The following example shows how to set the value for the `ToolTipService.VerticalOffset` attached property. [!code-csharp[ToolTipService#SetVerticalOffset](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ToolTipService/CSharp/Pane1.xaml.cs#setverticaloffset)] [!code-vb[ToolTipService#SetVerticalOffset](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ToolTipService/visualbasic/pane1.xaml.vb#setverticaloffset)]

summary.span: 取得或設定工具提示保持可見的時間量。

span.span: Gets or sets the amount of time that a tooltip remains visible.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會定義當使用者將滑鼠指標停留物件，定義工具提示時，工具提示保持可見的時間。This property defines the time that a tooltip remains visible while the user pauses the mouse pointer over the object that defines the tooltip. 如果使用者移動滑鼠指標的物件，工具提示就會關閉。If the user moves the mouse pointer off of the object, the tooltip closes. 這個屬性是附加的屬性。This property is an attached property. 如需有關如何取得或設定這個屬性的值，在程式碼中的資訊，請參閱 < 和方法。For information about how to get or set the value of this property in code, see the and methods. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## Examples 下列範例示範如何設定的工具提示的屬性。The following example shows how to set the property for a tooltip. [!code-xml[ToolTipService#NoToolTip](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ToolTipService/CSharp/Pane1.xaml#notooltip)] [!code-csharp[ToolTipService#SetShowDuration](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ToolTipService/CSharp/Pane1.xaml.cs#setshowduration)] [!code-vb[ToolTipService#SetShowDuration](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ToolTipService/visualbasic/pane1.xaml.vb#setshowduration)]

span.span: The value of the property is less than zero (0).

summary.span: 識別 附加屬性。

span.span: Identifies the attached property.

summary.span: 取得或設定工具提示的內容。

span.span: Gets or sets the content of a tooltip.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 工具提示內容的範圍從簡單的文字字串到更複雜的物件這類控制項和映像包含內嵌的項目。Tooltip content can range from a simple text string to more complex objects such as a element that has embedded controls and images. 不過，工具提示內容無法取得焦點。However, tooltip content cannot take focus. 例如，內部工具提示不能接收事件。For example, a inside a tooltip cannot receive a event. [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 提供控制項定義工具提示，並提供您可用來指定工具提示的行為的屬性。 provides a control that defines a tooltip and provides properties that you can use to specify tooltip behavior. 不過，工具提示可以是任何項目，例如或。However, a tooltip can be any element, such as a or an . 這個屬性是附加的屬性。This property is an attached property. 如需有關如何取得或設定這個屬性的值，在程式碼中的資訊，請參閱 < 和方法。For information about how to get or set the value of this property in code, see the and methods. [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]面顯示的是適用於填滿工具提示的物件是使用原生類型轉換，例如字串的基本類型的語法。The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] syntax shown here is appropriate if the object that fills the tooltip is a primitive with native type conversion, such as a string. 如果物件不支援原生型別轉換，或支援它自己的型別轉換子，您可能需要指定附加的屬性語法的詳細資訊形式，如下所示：If the object does not support native type conversion or support its own type converter, you might need to specify a verbose form of attached property syntax as follows: ``` ``` 預留位置項目*objectThatFillsTheToolTip*如果該物件允許它們，則也可以有子項目。The placeholder element *objectThatFillsTheToolTip* could also have child elements, if that object permits them. 不過，這種使用方式的需求應該相當罕見，因為大部分[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]使用方式將改為使用所公開之服務的實際控制項實作。However, the need for this usage should be relatively rare, because most [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] usages will instead use practical control implementations of the service that are exposed by . ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## Examples 下列範例示範如何指定工具提示使用。The following example shows how to specify a tooltip by using the . [!code-xml[ToolTipAssign#ToolTipServiceToolTip](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ToolTipAssign/CSharp/Pane1.xaml#tooltipservicetooltip)]

summary.span: 識別由使用 服務以顯示工具提示之物件公開 事件。

span.span: Identifies the event that is exposed by objects that use the service to display tooltips.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 工具提示關閉之前，就會發生事件。The event occurs immediately before a tooltip closes. 此欄位會註冊的行為類別，可使用這項服務的事件。This field registers the behavior of the event for classes that use this service. 並這兩個類別會實作並公開 （expose） 此事件，透過[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]存取子和。The and classes both implement the and expose this event through the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] accessors and . 如果您指定做為工具提示物件，工具提示關閉時，也會引發事件。If you specify the tooltip as a object, the event is also raised when the tooltip closes. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何設定事件處理常式事件。The following example shows how to set an event handler for the event. 在此情況下，事件處理常式實際上是針對，因為附加處理常式是在衍生的類別的。In this case, the event handler is actually for , because the where the handler is attached is a derived class of . [!code-csharp[ToolTipService#ToolTipServiceEventHandlers](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ToolTipService/CSharp/Pane1.xaml.cs#tooltipserviceeventhandlers)] [!code-vb[ToolTipService#ToolTipServiceEventHandlers](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ToolTipService/visualbasic/pane1.xaml.vb#tooltipserviceeventhandlers)] [!code-csharp[ToolTipService#ToolTipOpenAndCloseHandler](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ToolTipService/CSharp/Pane1.xaml.cs#tooltipopenandclosehandler)] [!code-vb[ToolTipService#ToolTipOpenAndCloseHandler](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ToolTipService/visualbasic/pane1.xaml.vb#tooltipopenandclosehandler)]

summary.span: 在 開啟時發生。

span.span: Occurs when the opens.

Public Shared ReadOnly ToolTipOpeningEvent As RoutedEvent

summary.span: 識別由使用 服務以顯示工具提示之物件公開 事件。

span.span: Identifies the event that is exposed by objects that use the service to display tooltips.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 工具提示開啟之前，就會發生事件。The event occurs immediately before a tooltip opens. 如果未定義的工具提示，或設定工具提示內容不會發生此事件為 null。This event does not occur if the tooltip is not defined or if the tooltip content is set to null. 此欄位會註冊的行為類別，可使用這項服務的事件。This field registers the behavior of the event for classes that use this service. 並這兩個類別會實作並公開 （expose） 此事件，透過[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]存取子和。The and classes both implement the and expose this event through the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] accessors and . 如果您指定做為工具提示物件，工具提示開啟時，也會引發事件。If you specify the tooltip as a object, the event is also raised when the tooltip opens. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何設定事件處理常式事件。The following example shows how to set an event handler for the event. 在此情況下，事件處理常式實際上是針對，因為附加處理常式是在衍生的類別的。In this case, the event handler is actually for , because the where the handler is attached is a derived class of . [!code-csharp[ToolTipService#ToolTipServiceEventHandlers](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ToolTipService/CSharp/Pane1.xaml.cs#tooltipserviceeventhandlers)] [!code-vb[ToolTipService#ToolTipServiceEventHandlers](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ToolTipService/visualbasic/pane1.xaml.vb#tooltipserviceeventhandlers)] [!code-csharp[ToolTipService#ToolTipOpenAndCloseHandler](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ToolTipService/CSharp/Pane1.xaml.cs#tooltipopenandclosehandler)] [!code-vb[ToolTipService#ToolTipOpenAndCloseHandler](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ToolTipService/visualbasic/pane1.xaml.vb#tooltipopenandclosehandler)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性是附加的屬性。This property is an attached property. 如需有關如何取得或設定這個屬性的值，在程式碼中的資訊，請參閱 < 和方法。For information about how to get or set the value of this property in code, see the and methods. 行為類似於屬性。 behaves similarly to the property. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[快顯放置行為](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior.md)。For more information, see [Popup Placement Behavior](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior.md). ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ```
